articles.content: South Australian health authorities have warned AFL fans not to touch the ball if it flies into the crowd during Adelaides home game against Collingwood, sparking puns about possible airborne transmi… [+3238 chars]

articles.author: Joe Williams
articles.title: Carragher urges Everton to appoint Liverpool hero as boss - Football365
articles.description: Jamie Carragher has urged Everton to appoint former Liverpool boss Rafa Benitez as Carlo Ancelotti's successor at Goodison Park.
articles.content:
Jamie Carragher has urged Everton to appoint former Liverpool boss Rafa Benitez as Carlo Ancelotti’s successor.
Ancelotti, who joined the Toffees on a four-and-a-half-year contract in December 2019,… [+2523 chars]
